name: The crystal of Spirits
description:
This game may not be some "wow" yet, but it is my first game that I created with the help of my friends. Every comment and note about the game will make it better and better.

Thanks for the help and scripts:  Przemek Miziołek

History
You play the role Spirit of the Forest  facing the challenge of finding the crystals.
You live in a land Wri. 
You must save yourself and the inhabitants of the land from the evil hands of a collector

   This is you ( Spirit of the Forest)

"As a Spirit and Protector of the Forest, I have the duty to protect the Forest and its residents"
"However, there are evil forces that try to destroy our forest."

  This is Collector (Spider Spirit)

  This is resident (ghost)
